overview: After being framed for drug smuggling and imprisoned in Mainland China, Yukari’s character faces a death sentence after an escape attempt.  She is befriended in prison by Clare Wai’s character, and a mission to rescue her is launched from HK.  Although the team initially succeeds by impersonating Mainland police, the escape plan misfires and they must flee on foot to the border, fighting a series of battles with the pursuing militia.
title: Never Say Regret
